txt.en: 'Noglond is the last line of defence for Thorin's Hall. I am proud to serve here!'
'My father wanted me to be posted at Thorin's Hall so he could keep an eye on me. He worries too much.'
'If you follow the road to the south and east, you will reach the great outpost of Gondamon.'
'I wish I was posted at Gondamon. Maybe then I'd see some real adventure!'
'If you saw a norbog, you wouldn't think to cook it. The claws are a delicacy, though!'
